overview:
As a designer, brand strategist and an entrepreneur I have 12 years professional experience in bringing ideas to life, coordinating and realising innovation solutions to brand design, leading creative projects and supporting both strategic solutions and dynamic pitches to successful conclusion.

I have worked with a range of international clients: airlines, sports brands, mobile companies, energy providers and financial institutions on various projects from brand platform creation to design manuals and websites.

I have founded and am currently running Buildabrand.com, a UK based start-up that will provide an instant, friendly, easy-to-use and professional online branding service.

Whether creating my own ideas or helping others to realise theirs, I love working with start-ups and original new projects that embrace a strong entrepreneurial spirit.
